dmca.title: Chinese Blogger Complains of Infringement
dmca.body:
25 September 2003

Google, Inc
Attn.: Blogger, DMCA Complaints
[PRIVATE]
Mountain View, CA 94043
[Fax: [PRIVATE]]

Dear Sirs

Notice of infringement

I am writing to file a notice of infringement by "http://siubo.blogspot.com" on the contents of my blog "http://pk_.blogspot.com".

1. My works that I believe have been infringed upon are detailed below:
    (A) My post dated 17 July 2002 at
        http://pk_.blogspot.com/archives/2002_07_14_pk__archive.html#200293108
       
        His post dated 1 Aug 2002 at
        http://siubo.blogspot.com/2002_07_28_siubo_archive.html
        #106177761207248320 

    (B) My post dated 23 Jan 2003 at
        http://pk_.blogspot.com/archives/2003_01_19_pk__archive.html#200276197

       His post dated 14 Jan 2003 at
        http://siubo.blogspot.com/2003_01_12_siubo_archive.html
        #106325157886171059

    (C) My post dated 9 Sep 2003 at
        http://pk_.blogspot.com/archives/2003_09_07_pk__archive.html
        #106309803509076022

       His post dated 11 Sep 2003 	
	http://siubo.blogspot.com/2003_09_07_siubo_archive.html
        #106324555980732720

    (D) My post dated 6 Sep 2003 at
        http://pk_.blogspot.com/archives/2003_08_31_pk__archive.html
        #106281631743590151

       His post dated 10 Sep 2003 at	
	http://siubo.blogspot.com/2003_09_07_siubo_archive.html
        #106325178665339251	 	

2. The materials have been taken on a copy and paste basis, in whole or in part.

3. I can be contacted at [PRIVATE].

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorised by me or the law.

5. I swear under penalty of perjury that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the owner of an exclusive right to my writing that is allegedly infringed.

Yours faithfully,

[PRIVATE]
